casebody.data:
ARMSTRONG
v.
D.C. AUTOMOTIVE, et al. No. 490P06-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 3, 2007. Mayor of City of Wilson for D.C. Automotive.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 28th day of February 2007 by Plaintiff for "Petition for Rehearing":

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 3rd day of May 2007."
